name: Thunder Jumper
description:
Note: Thunder Jumper began as an in-class group project. The four of us have since graduated and are on to new adventures. While I do plan to come back and create many more levels, I am releasing the completed 11 for now. We all really loved working on this game together and hope you enjoy playing it. Thanks for clicking!

Thunder Jumper is a classic vertical platformer with a twist. Get ready to jump on powerlines and platforms to try to make it to the top of the city, but watch out... the storm is getting pretty strong. I'm sure the lightning won't get to you...or will it?

How to Play:

Use A, D, Left Arrow, and Right Arrow to move left and right.

Use Space to jump.

Get to the umbrella at the top to fly to the next level!

Credits:
  • Austin Rieke: Producer, programming
  • Valerie Kolb: Sound design, level design, tile art
  • Zach Proffitt: Character art, animations, item art
  • Alex Georganas: Background art, menu art
